title: US Nurse Shot Dead In ICE Raid, Minneapolis Gov. Walz Urges Halt As Trump Backs Agents | Alex Pretti
description:
US federal agents have fatally shot 37-year-old American citizen Alex Jeffrey Pretti in Minneapolis, igniting outrage and protests. Pretti, an ICU nurse, was killed during a federal immigration operation, with authorities saying he approached agents with a handgun — a claim contradicted by bystander video showing him holding a phone before being restrained and shot. Local leaders condemned the shooting and demanded investigations, while the Trump administration defended the agents’ actions.

#iceprotest #alexpretti #trump #worldnews
